login.title: Katorin Login
login.subtitle: Please select the appropriate tab to sign in.
login.teamInfo: Please enter the team name (username) and password provided by the administrator.
login.passwordHelperText: Please enter the password provided by the administrator

passwordReset.title: Password Reset
passwordReset.success: Password has been reset successfully. Please return to the login screen and sign in with your new password.
passwordReset.successEmailSent: Password reset link generated. Please check your email.

create.title: Create Tournament
create.subtitle: The tournament code (slug) will also be used as the email domain. Please use alphanumeric characters and hyphens only.
create.slugHelperText: Only alphanumeric characters and hyphens. If left blank it will be auto-generated from the tournament name.
create.errorSlugInvalid: Slug must contain only alphanumeric characters and hyphens.
create.errorInvalidResponse: The server returned an invalid response.

selection.title: Select Tournament
selection.subtitle: First select the tournament you want to manage. You can also create a new tournament.
selection.noTournaments: No tournaments registered yet. Please press Create Tournament to register one first.
selection.errorFailed: Failed to retrieve tournament list. Please try again later.
selection.errorInvalidResponse: The server returned an invalid response.

create.title: Create Admin Account
create.subtitle: Add an admin account that can be used to log in with the created email and password. Added users will automatically be granted administrator privileges.
create.errorFailed: Failed to create admin account. Please try again later.
create.errorInvalidResponse: The server returned an invalid response.

duel.serverError: The server returned an invalid response.

duelInput.noRecords: No match records yet. Please register from Add Match Record.
duelInput.deleteConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this match record?

resultEntry.fetchError: Failed to retrieve match information. Please try again.
resultEntry.saveFailed: Failed to save result. Please check your input and try again.

matchManager.serverError: The server returned an invalid response.
matchManager.fetchRoundsFailed: Failed to retrieve round list. Please try again later.
matchManager.fetchMatchesFailed: Failed to retrieve match data. Please try again later.
matchManager.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this match?
matchManager.title: Match Management Tool
matchManager.matchCardListDescription: View and edit details of each match card
matchManager.roundClosedCanReopen: This round is closed. It can be reopened as there are no subsequent rounds.
matchManager.roundClosedCannotReopen: This round is closed. It cannot be reopened as there are subsequent rounds.
matchManager.createMatchPrompt: Please create a new match from Create Match
matchManager.participantManagementDescription: Team and participant management features will be added in the future
matchManager.deleteMatchConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this match?

teamManagement.title: Team Management
teamManagement.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this team?

participantManagement.title: Participant Management
participantManagement.fetchTeamsForMoveError: Failed to fetch teams for moving
participantManagement.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this participant?
